p: Five week-old Swiss albino mice weighing 28–32 g were purchased from animal house of Department of Pharmacy, Jahangirnagar University, Savar, Dhaka, Bangladesh. The mice were acclimatized to the new environment for a week before starting of experiment. During experiment period all animals were maintained in a well-ventilated animal house at 25 ± 2 °C and relative humidity of 50–60%. Standard food pellets and fresh drinking water were supplied throughout the experimental periods. All mice were kept in cage and maintained with natural 12 h light and dark cycle. This animal experiment was designed on the basis of the Ethical Principles and Guidelines guided by the Swiss Academy of Medical Sciences and the Swiss Academy of Sciences. The study protocol was permitted by both the Ethical review committee and the P&D committee of the Department of Pharmacy, International Islamic University Chittagong, Bangladesh under the code Pharm-P&D-61/0818-122.
